overview: How did Alex's money disappear?  What happened to Pınar's sister?  How old is Amine really?  And above all, what does the mysterious neighbor Friede want?  These and other questions are addressed in this film as the camera swims through Berlin with Alex, Amine and Pınar. We see the city, and of course the life, through their eyes.  But, how far inside their lives can the camera really go?
title: Swimming Through The City
